title: Time to order pumpkin rolls
content:
_ The Catholic Woman’s Club of St. Agnes Church is once again preparing for its annual pumpkin roll sale and will begin to accept orders for them starting Monday. A pumpkin roll is $9. To place an order, call St. Agnes Church Hall at (740) 535-0098; Joanne Raha at (740) 282-1612; or Barbara Crugnale at (740-535-0174). Pumpkin rolls may be ordered and picked up in the parish hall Monday through Thursday, from 9 a.m. to noon or 5 p.m. to 7 p.m. Orders should be picked up within two days of ordering. St. Agnes Church is located at 204 St. Clair Ave., Mingo Junction. The last day to order is Oct. 22. All orders must be picked up by Oct. 27 from 9 a.m. to 12 noon. Involved in the fundraiser are, seated, from left, CWC members Paula Robson, Barbara Crugnale, President JoAnne Raha and Jackie Parks; and standing, Karen Sabatino, Debbie DiNofrio, Jeanette Gibson and Theresa Madden.

-- Contributed
